hamuwa[sanskaranaya] athata atha dena kim jon-un ha mun ja-in dakunu koriyanu gaurawa mura kandayam piriksamin sama mandura thula sakachcha kirim da.koriyawen yojana kala sthana athurin da.koriyawe panmunjom hawul aarakshaka pedese pihita athi sama mandura uthura mangin samulu pihituma lesa piliganna ladi.[7][8] sakachchawalata amathara wa, derata nayakayin wisin derate ma pas ha jalaya yoda ganimin ruk ropanothsawayak ha bhojanothsawayak da pawathwana ladi.

kolambaa nalanda widyalaya paradawamin awurudu 19n pahala ‘bi’ kandaye samastha lanka baskat bol tharagawaliye surathawa himikara ganimata moratuwa wels kumara widyalaya samathwiya. 2010 wasare pawathwiya yuthuwa thibu me tharagawaliya migamuwa joshap was widyalaya wenuwen gonuwu wirodhathawak hethuwen kal dama thibu athara wayas kandaya ikmawa giya kridakayan thama kandayame siti bawata warada piligath joshap was widyalaya tharagawaliyen iwath wimath samaga aasiyanu jathyanthara pasalata awasan purwa watayata piwisimata haki wiya.pasugiyada moratuwa wels kumara widyalayiya baskat bol pitiyedi nimawa dutu me tharagawaliya shri lanka pasal baskat bol sangamaya mehewu athara awasan tharagayedi moratuwa wels kumara widyalaya 60-42k lesa nalanda widyalayiya pila paradawiya.tharagaye palamu karthuwe sitama peramuna ganimata wels kumara widyalaya samath wu athara gihan sarinda ha kanishka liyanage thama widyalaye jayagrahanaya wenuwen kapi penena daskam dakwiya.

dalada maligawata peraharakin gaman karana dasuna mahanuwara asala perahara uthsawaya thula jathika samangiya goda nagena katayuthu godak sidu wenawa.dalada wahanse kanda udaratata wadama karawimata pera patan nuwara dewala perahara pawathwuwa.dalada wahanse wadama karawimen pasu unwahanse udesa demala janathawa thula pawathna nomada gaurawaya ismathu wune dewala perahara awasanaye pradhana pujakawaru athulu kandayamak peraharin dalada maligawata gos dalada wahanseta pudapuja pawathwima thulinuyi.pasu kalaye dalada maligawe peraharath dewala perahara ha ekathu wuna.eth eda pawathi charithraya adath ee aakarayenma ishta kerenawa.asala perahara mangalyaye awasan randoli perahara widi sancharaya aarambha karanna kalin kowile perahara wenuwen wishesha pujawak pawathwanawa.pasuwa pradhana bharakaru,pujakawaru athulu siya deneku gen pamana samanwitha kandayamak dalada maligawata peraharakin gaman karanawa.ehidi diyawadana nilame thumanta demala charithranukulawa salu porawa aashirwada karamin perahara mangalyaya kisidu karadarayak badhawak nomathiwa hondin awasan karanna labewayi aashirwada karanawa.mema awasthawedi wishesha saluwak diyawana nilame thumanta laba denne edina perahara karanduwa ee matha thaba wadama karannayi….

kakirawa nagaraya kalambau galgamuwe atha namin handunwana andha athage shariraye athi thuwala hethuwen dadi asadhya thaththwayen pasuwana bawa wanajiwi pashu waidyawaru eeye (01) paswaruwe pawasuha.mema athata prathikara kirima sandaha wanajiwi departhamenthuwe sitina pashu waidyawarun hayadenagen siwdenekma atha sitina kalawawa ismaththata pamina prathikara katayuthu karathi.athage sirura pura athi thuwala pasawima hethuwen aahara ganima saha jalaya ganima pawa nawatha athayi wanajiwi niyojya adhyaksha waidya tharaka prasad mahatha pawasiya.waidyawarun wana wanajiwi niyojya adhyaksha (saukhya) waidya tharaka prasad, pashu waidyawarun wana dabliw.
anna eekayi amadhyapa wyaparayath ekka math pan wala aadinawa gana wishaya nirdeshayata adala nowu desanayak kale.
